TopicTitle: Staging locked in tutorial going to the mun part 1 and can't unlock them.

Articles.Content:
As title says staging is locked in this tutorial and they wont unlock. Playing on steam deck, alt + L does nothing.


Any help, work around or other ways to unlock them.
Alt+F12 > clear input locks? Sometimes the game trips over itself and the input locks kick in, preventing you from staging etc. but clearing the locks will often fix it.
I think there is a staging lock that can be toggled with Alt + L, but I'm not sure since I never use staging lock. But you could try it with Alt + L
